name: Baby's First Concussion
description:
CONTROLS

Keyboard: 

--- Move with ARROW KEYS  ---  SPACE Jumps 

--- ALT OR SHIFT will pause the level your on and return you to the upper level.

ALSO WORKS WITH A GAMEPAD!

Completed for Ludum Dare 48 Compo

Theme: Deeper and Deeper...

 (All code, art and sounds created by myself during 48 Hours)

By the way, the baby is OKAY so don't worry.  But every time he tries to hit a block with his head for a power up, he'll go unconscious and enter a different plane of reality.

What that means for you is another level.  It can be hard to get back when you've gone too deep....  See if you can find his bottle.
